name: OurSphere
slogan: A members-only club which acts as our members' professional and social concierge
description:
We help our members save time and energy by providing them with high quality connections through handpicked intimate gatherings

Traditional members clubs are costly and typical networking events are usually time consuming and yield very little results.  Our approach of intimate gatherings on focused topics taking place at trending spots will provide our members with high quality networking opportunities without compromising the exclusive experience.

team.name: Heather Zhang
team.bioHtml: Ex Gartner, Bloomberg and Dow Jones.  Currently the founder of OurSphere - a members only community in London and New York.

jobs.title: Business Partner / Co-Founder
jobs.description:
I am seeking a business partner who is available to work full time and passionate about this business idea.  

Responsibilities include working with me on the business and marketing strategy and a laser focus on engaging with target customers and analyzing user behavior to grow this customer base rapidly before seed round.
jobs.descriptionHtml:
